00030 //**********************************************************
00032 //**********************************************************
00033 class IXRenderable
00034 {
00035 public:
00036         enum ETYPE
00037         {
00038                 ET_TEXTURE,
00039                 ET_TEXTURECUBE,
00040                 ET_TEXTURERECT,
00041                 ET_RENDERBUFFER,
00042         };
00043 
00044         IXRenderable() { }
00045         virtual ~IXRenderable() { }
00046 
00048         virtual ETYPE                                   GetType() const = 0;
00049         virtual void                                    BindToFramebuffer( unsigned int fbo, GrTextureCube::ECUBEFACE face ) = 0;
00050 
00052         virtual URef< GrTextureBase >   GetTexture() const              {       return 0;                                                               }
00053         virtual void                                    UnbindTexture() const   { }
00054         virtual void                                    AutoGenMipmaps() const  { }
00055 };

00061 class IXTextureRenderable : public IXRenderable
00062 {
00063 public:
00064         IXTextureRenderable( URef< GrTexture > texture );
00065         ~IXTextureRenderable() { }
00066 
00067         ETYPE                                                   GetType() const                 {       return ET_TEXTURE;                                              }
00068         void                                                    BindToFramebuffer( unsigned int attachment, GrTextureCube::ECUBEFACE face );
00069         URef<GrTextureBase>                             GetTexture() const              {       return ( GrTexture* )_texture;                  }
00070         void                                                    UnbindTexture() const   {       _texture->Unbind();                                             }
00071         void                                                    AutoGenMipmaps() const;
00072 
00073 private:
00074         URef<GrTexture>                                 _texture;
00075         bool                                                    _genMipmaps;
00076 };

00080 : _texture( texture )
00081 , _genMipmaps( false )

00212 //----------------------------------------------------------
00213 GrRenderTarget::GrRenderTarget( unsigned int width, unsigned int height )
00214 : _width( width )
00215 , _height( height )
00216 , _viewportRect( width, height )
00217 , _targetCount( 0 )
00218 , _depthRenderable( 0 )
00219 , _stencilRenderable( 0 )
00220 , _fbo( 0 )
00221 , _curRenderFace( GrTextureCube::CF_NEGATIVEZ )
00222 , _cubeTarget( false )
00223 , _autoGenMipmaps( false )
00224 , _isValid( true )
00225 , _isPrimary( true )
00226 {
00228         B_ASSERT( _curBound == 0 );
00229         B_ASSERT( _primaryRT == 0 );
00230         _curBound = this;
00231         _primaryRT = this;
00232 }

00234 //----------------------------------------------------------
00235 GrRenderTarget::GrRenderTarget( URef< GrTextureBase >* colorTargets, URef< GrRenderbuffer > depthBuffer,
00236                                                            unsigned int colorTargetCount )
00237 : _width( 0 )
00238 , _height( 0 )
00239 , _viewportRect( 0, 0 )
00240 , _targetCount( colorTargetCount )
00241 , _depthRenderable( 0 )
00242 , _stencilRenderable( 0 )
00243 , _fbo( 0 )
00244 , _curRenderFace( GrTextureCube::CF_NEGATIVEZ )
00245 , _cubeTarget( false )
00246 , _autoGenMipmaps( false )
00247 , _isValid( true )
00248 , _isPrimary( false )
00249 {
00251         B_ASSERT( colorTargetCount < kMaxRTs );
00252         B_ASSERT( colorTargetCount > 0 || depthBuffer != 0 );
00253 
00254         CHECK_GL();
00255 
00257         MemSet( _colorRenderables, 0, sizeof( _colorRenderables ) );
00258         if ( colorTargetCount > 0 )
00259         {
00260                 SetColorTargets( colorTargets, colorTargetCount );
00261                 _cubeTarget = colorTargets[ 0 ]->GetType() == GrTextureBase::ETT_CUBE;
00262         }
00263         else if ( depthBuffer != 0 )
00264         {
00265                 _width = depthBuffer->GetWidth();
00266                 _height = depthBuffer->GetHeight();
00267                 _cubeTarget = false;
00268         }
00269 
00271         _viewportRect.SetWidth( _width );
00272         _viewportRect.SetHeight( _height );
00273 
00275         if ( depthBuffer != 0 )
00276         {
00278                 B_ASSERT( depthBuffer->GetWidth() == _width && depthBuffer->GetHeight() == _height );
00279                 _depthRenderable = new IXBufferRenderable( depthBuffer );
00280                 CHECK_GL();
00281                 if ( depthBuffer->GetFormat() == GrRenderbuffer::EF_DEPTHSTENCIL ||
00282                         depthBuffer->GetFormat() == GrRenderbuffer::EF_DEPTH24STENCIL8 )
00283                 {
00284                         _stencilRenderable = new IXBufferRenderable( depthBuffer );
00285                         CHECK_GL();
00286                 }
00287         }
00288 
00290         CreateFBO();
00291 }

00293 //----------------------------------------------------------
00294 GrRenderTarget::GrRenderTarget( URef< GrTextureBase >* colorTargets, URef< GrTextureBase > depthTexture, unsigned int colorTargetCount )
00295 : _width( 0 )
00296 , _height( 0 )
00297 , _viewportRect( 0, 0 )
00298 , _targetCount( colorTargetCount )
00299 , _depthRenderable( 0 )
00300 , _stencilRenderable( 0 )
00301 , _fbo( 0 )
00302 , _curRenderFace( GrTextureCube::CF_NEGATIVEZ )
00303 , _cubeTarget( false )
00304 , _autoGenMipmaps( false )
00305 , _isValid( true )
00306 , _isPrimary( false )
00307 {
00309         B_ASSERT( colorTargetCount < kMaxRTs );
00310         B_ASSERT( colorTargetCount > 0 || depthTexture != 0 );
00311 
00313         MemSet( _colorRenderables, 0, sizeof( _colorRenderables ) );
00314         if ( colorTargetCount > 0 )
00315         {
00316                 SetColorTargets( colorTargets, colorTargetCount );
00317                 _cubeTarget = colorTargets[ 0 ]->GetType() == GrTextureBase::ETT_CUBE;
00318         }
00319         else if ( depthTexture != 0 )
00320         {
00321                 GetTextureDim( _width, _height, depthTexture );
00322                 _cubeTarget = depthTexture->GetType() == GrTextureBase::ETT_CUBE;
00323         }
00324 
00326         _viewportRect.SetWidth( _width );
00327         _viewportRect.SetHeight( _height );
00328 
00330         if ( depthTexture != 0 )
00331         {
00333                 _depthRenderable = CreateRenderable( depthTexture );
00334 
00336                 if ( depthTexture->GetFormat() == GrTextureBase::EF_DEPTHSTENCIL )
00337                 {
00338                         _stencilRenderable = CreateRenderable( depthTexture );
00339                 }
00340         }
00341 
00343         CreateFBO();
00344 }

00346 //----------------------------------------------------------
00347 GrRenderTarget::GrRenderTarget( URef< GrRenderbuffer > colorBuffer, URef< GrRenderbuffer > depthBuffer )
00348 : _width( 0 )
00349 , _height( 0 )
00350 , _viewportRect( 0, 0 )
00351 , _targetCount( colorBuffer != 0 ? 1 : 0 )
00352 , _depthRenderable( 0 )
00353 , _stencilRenderable( 0 )
00354 , _fbo( 0 )
00355 , _curRenderFace( GrTextureCube::CF_NEGATIVEZ )
00356 , _cubeTarget( false )
00357 , _autoGenMipmaps( false )
00358 , _isValid( true )
00359 , _isPrimary( false )
00360 {
00361         B_ASSERT( colorBuffer != 0 || depthBuffer != 0 );
00362 
00363         CHECK_GL();
00364 
00366         MemSet( _colorRenderables, 0, sizeof( _colorRenderables ) );
00367         if ( colorBuffer != 0 )
00368         {
00369                 _width = colorBuffer->GetWidth();
00370                 _height = colorBuffer->GetHeight();
00371                 _colorRenderables[ 0 ] = new IXBufferRenderable( colorBuffer );
00372         }
00373         else if ( depthBuffer != 0 )
00374         {
00375                 _width = depthBuffer->GetWidth();
00376                 _height = depthBuffer->GetHeight();
00377         }
00378 
00380         _viewportRect.SetWidth( _width );
00381         _viewportRect.SetHeight( _height );
00382 
00384         if ( depthBuffer != 0 )
00385         {
00387                 B_ASSERT( depthBuffer->GetWidth() == _width && depthBuffer->GetHeight() == _height );
00388                 _depthRenderable = new IXBufferRenderable( depthBuffer );
00389                 CHECK_GL();
00390                 if ( depthBuffer->GetFormat() == GrRenderbuffer::EF_DEPTHSTENCIL ||
00391                         depthBuffer->GetFormat() == GrRenderbuffer::EF_DEPTH24STENCIL8 )
00392                 {
00393                         _stencilRenderable = new IXBufferRenderable( depthBuffer );
00394                         CHECK_GL();
00395                 }
00396         }
00397 
00399         CreateFBO();
00400 }

00402 //----------------------------------------------------------
00403 GrRenderTarget::~GrRenderTarget()
00404 {
00405         if ( !_isPrimary )
00406         {
00407                 DestroyFBO();
00408                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _targetCount; ++i )
00409                         delete _colorRenderables[ i ];
00410 
00411                 delete _depthRenderable;
00412                 delete _stencilRenderable;
00413         }
00414         else
00415         {
00416                 _primaryRT = 0;
00417         }
00418 
00419         if ( this == _curBound )
00420                 _curBound = 0;
00421 }

00473 //----------------------------------------------------------
00474 bool
00475 GrRenderTarget::HasDepthTex()
00476 {
00477         return _depthRenderable != 0 && _depthRenderable->GetType() == IXRenderable::ET_TEXTURE;
00478 }

00480 //----------------------------------------------------------
00481 URef< GrTextureBase >
00482 GrRenderTarget::GetDepthTex() const
00483 {
00485         IXRenderable* renderable = _depthRenderable;
00486         if ( renderable->GetType() == IXRenderable::ET_TEXTURE )
00487         {
00488                 return ( GrTextureBase* )( ( IXTextureRenderable* )renderable )->GetTexture();
00489         }
00490         return 0;

00506 GrRenderTarget::Bind( bool setVP )

00509         if ( setVP )
00510                 GrViewport( _viewportRect.GetX(), _viewportRect.GetY(), _viewportRect.GetWidth(), _viewportRect.GetHeight() );

00513 //----------------------------------------------------------
00514 void
00515 GrRenderTarget::SetActiveFace( GrTextureCube::ECUBEFACE face )
00516 {
00518         B_ASSERT( _isValid );
00519 
00521         if ( _cubeTarget && _curRenderFace != face )
00522         {
00523                 _curRenderFace = face;
00524                 if ( _curBound == this )
00525                 {
00527                         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _targetCount; ++i )
00528                                 _colorRenderables[ i ]->BindToFramebuffer( GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT + i, _curRenderFace );
00529                 }
00530         }
00531 }

00533 //----------------------------------------------------------
00534 void
00535 GrRenderTarget::PreContextReset()
00536 {
00537         if ( !_isPrimary )
00538                 DestroyFBO();
00539 }
00540 
00541 //----------------------------------------------------------
00542 void
00543 GrRenderTarget::PostContextReset()
00544 {
00545         if ( !_isPrimary )
00546         {
00547                 CreateFBO();
00548         }
00549         else
00550         {
00551                 _width = gGrSubsys->GetScreenWidth();
00552                 _height = gGrSubsys->GetScreenHeight();
00553         }
00554 }

00561 //----------------------------------------------------------
00562 void
00563 GrRenderTarget::GetTextureDim( unsigned int& width, unsigned int& height, URef< GrTextureBase > texture )
00564 {
00565         GrTextureBase::ETEXTURETYPE type = texture->GetType();
00566         if ( type == GrTextureBase::ETT_2D )
00567         {
00568                 width = ( ( GrTexture* )( GrTextureBase* )texture )->GetWidth();
00569                 height = ( ( GrTexture* )( GrTextureBase* )texture )->GetHeight();
00570         }
00571         else if ( type == GrTextureBase::ETT_RECT )
00572         {
00573                 width = ( ( GrTextureRect* )( GrTextureBase* )texture )->GetWidth();
00574                 height = ( ( GrTextureRect* )( GrTextureBase* )texture )->GetHeight();
00575         }
00576         else if ( type == GrTextureBase::ETT_CUBE )
00577         {
00578                 width = ( ( GrTextureCube* )( GrTextureBase* )texture )->GetDim();
00579                 height = width;
00580         }
00581 }
00582 
00583 //----------------------------------------------------------
00584 IXRenderable*
00585 GrRenderTarget::CreateRenderable( URef< GrTextureBase > texture )
00586 {
00588         GrTextureBase::ETEXTURETYPE type = texture->GetType();
00589         if ( type == GrTextureBase::ETT_2D )
00590                 return new IXTextureRenderable( ( GrTexture* )( GrTextureBase* )texture );
00591         else if ( type == GrTextureBase::ETT_RECT )
00592                 return new IXTextureRectRenderable( ( GrTextureRect* )( GrTextureBase* )texture );
00593         
00594         B_ASSERT( type == GrTextureBase::ETT_CUBE );
00595         return new IXTextureCubeRenderable( ( GrTextureCube* )( GrTextureBase* )texture );
00596 }
00597 
00598 //----------------------------------------------------------
00599 void
00600 GrRenderTarget::SetColorTargets( URef< GrTextureBase >* colorTargets, unsigned int colorTargetCount )
00601 {
00603         if ( colorTargetCount == 0 )
00604                 return;
00605 
00606         CHECK_GL();
00607 
00609         GetTextureDim( _width, _height, colorTargets[ 0 ] );
00610 
00613         GrTextureBase::ETEXTURETYPE type = colorTargets[ 0 ]->GetType();
00614         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < colorTargetCount; ++i )
00615                 _colorRenderables[ i ] = CreateRenderable( colorTargets[ i ] );
00616 
00617         CHECK_GL();
00618 }
00619 
00620 //----------------------------------------------------------
00621 void
00622 GrRenderTarget::LoseBind()
00623 {
00625         if ( _autoGenMipmaps )
00626         {
00627                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _targetCount; ++i )
00628                 {
00629                         B_ASSERT( _colorRenderables[ i ] != 0 );
00630                         _colorRenderables[ i ]->AutoGenMipmaps();
00631                 }
00632 
00633                 if ( _depthRenderable != 0 )
00634                         _depthRenderable->AutoGenMipmaps();
00635         }
00636 }
00637 
00638 //----------------------------------------------------------
00639 void
00640 GrRenderTarget::CreateFBO()
00641 {
00643         B_ASSERT( _width > 0 && _height > 0 );
00644         B_ASSERT( _targetCount >= 0 && _targetCount < 4 );
00645 
00647         int prevFBO = 0;
00648         bglGetIntegerv( GL_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING_EXT, &prevFBO );
00649 
00651         bglGenFramebuffersEXT( 1, &_fbo );
00652         bglBindFramebufferEXT( GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, _fbo );
00653         CHECK_GL();
00654 
00656         if ( _depthRenderable != 0 )
00657         {
00658                 _depthRenderable->BindToFramebuffer( GL_DEPTH_ATTACHMENT_EXT, _curRenderFace );
00659                 CHECK_GL();
00660         }
00661 
00662         if ( _stencilRenderable != 0 )
00663         {
00664                 _stencilRenderable->BindToFramebuffer( GL_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_EXT, _curRenderFace );
00665                 CHECK_GL();
00666         }
00667 
00668         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _targetCount; ++i )
00669         {
00671                 _colorRenderables[ i ]->BindToFramebuffer( GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT + i, _curRenderFace );
00672                 CHECK_GL();
00673         }
00674 
00676         unsigned int drawBuffers = 0;
00677         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _targetCount; ++i )
00678                 drawBuffers |= GR_COLOR_ATTACH0 << i;
00679 
00680         GrDrawBuffers( drawBuffers );
00681         GrReadBuffer( drawBuffers & GR_COLOR_ATTACH0 );
00682         CHECK_GL();
00683 
00686         GLenum status = bglCheckFramebufferStatusEXT( GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT );
00687         if ( status == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_UNSUPPORTED_EXT )
00688         {
00690                 PrintF( "Framebuffer creation failed; configuration not supported.\n" );
00691                 _isValid = false;
00692         }
00693         else if ( status != GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE_EXT )
00694         {
00695                 switch( status )
00696                 {
00697                 case GL_FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_ATTACHMENT_EXT:
00698                         B_ERROR( "Framebuffer incomplete ( General programming error ): Incomplete attachment!" );
00699 
00700                 case GL_FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_MISSING_ATTACHMENT_EXT:
00701                         B_ERROR( "Framebuffer incomplete ( General programming error ): Incomplete missing attachment!" );
00702 
00703                 case GL_FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_DIMENSIONS_EXT:
00704                         B_ERROR( "Framebuffer incomplete ( General programming error ): Incomplete dimensions!" );
00705 
00706                 case GL_FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_FORMATS_EXT:
00707                         B_ERROR( "Framebuffer incomplete ( General programming error ): Incomplete formats!" );
00708 
00709                 case GL_FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_DRAW_BUFFER_EXT:
00710                         B_ERROR( "Framebuffer incomplete ( General programming error ): Incomplete draw buffer!" );
00711 
00712                 case GL_FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_READ_BUFFER_EXT:
00713                         B_ERROR( "Framebuffer incomplete ( General programming error ): Incomplete read buffer!" );
00714 
00715                 default:
00716                         B_ERROR( "Framebuffer incomplete ( General programming error ): Unknown error!" );
00717                 };
00718         }
00719 
00722         B_ASSERT( status == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE_EXT || !_isValid );
00723         bglBindFramebufferEXT( GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, prevFBO );
00724 }
00725 
00726 //----------------------------------------------------------
00727 void
00728 GrRenderTarget::DestroyFBO()
00729 {
00732         B_ASSERT( _curBound != this );
00733         bglDeleteFramebuffersEXT( 1, &_fbo );
00734         _fbo = 0;
00735 }
00736 
00737 //----------------------------------------------------------
00738 void
00739 GrRenderTarget::BindRT()
00740 {
00742         B_ASSERT( _isValid );
00743 
00745         if ( _curBound == this )
00746                 return;
00747 
00749         bglBindFramebufferEXT( GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, _fbo );
00750         CHECK_GL();
00751 
00753         if ( _curBound )
00754                 _curBound->LoseBind();
00755 
00757         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _targetCount; ++i )
00758                 _colorRenderables[ i ]->UnbindTexture();
00759 
00761         _curBound = this;
00762         if ( _cubeTarget )
00763         {
00765                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _targetCount; ++i )
00766                 {
00767                         _colorRenderables[ i ]->BindToFramebuffer( GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT + i, _curRenderFace );
00768                 }
00769         }
00770 }
